headerTop: COLLECT POINTS OF THE DAILY AND THE FINAL RAFFLES,
headerBottom: WIN A SHARE FROM 250 000₾ AND AN FLAT IN BATUMI!
registerText: PASS THE VERIFICATION AND GET 100 TICKETS FOR THE DAILY RAFFLE!
watchLive: WATCH THE LIVE RAFFLE HERE AND
getSpins: DURING THE RAFFLE, CLICK ON THE "GET FREEPINS" BUTTON AND GET THE SAME NUMBER OF EGT FREESPINS AS MANY TICKETS YOU HAVE COLLECTED!
forTicket: *TO GET A TICKET FILL THE PROGRESS UP TO 1 000₾
forTicket2: *TO GET A TICKET FILL THE PROGRESS UP TO 5 000₾
schedule: THE RAFFLE WILL BE HELD ON
schedule2: AT 21:55, ON THE OFFICIAL PAGE OF CROCOBET
